h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
content: Head toward the path on the other side of the cave, where the lamp is glowing. Follow this until you reach the next section with a taller waterfall, then turn left.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Water Curtain Cave'.
The content is as follows:
Head toward the path on the other side of the cave, where the lamp is glowing. Follow this until you reach the next section with a taller waterfall, then turn left.
